articles.content: A deadly new coronavirus has spread to two dozen countries from China. So far, Iceland isnt one of them.That hasnt stopped the country of 363,000 people from preparing a building called Place X to quarantine hundreds of people, should the need arise. Iceland … [+5843 chars]
